data.text: @KashPrime We have been shielding/ taking limited risks as a family. As a #sandwichcarer #carer  I have been into a cafe 5 times, a gym once & met friends 12 times max in 2 years. occupational deprivation has an impact. Its exhausting, isolating, depressing. @OT_Expert @RCOT_Gen @CarersUK

@KashPrime #sandwichcarer #carer The problem comes down to power. Children and teachers are often disempowered. All schools need HEPA filters in at least one room so the vulnerable May continue to get/ provide an education without the risk of catching or passing on Covid 19.

@KashPrime Until we get better vaccines 😂 #VACCINEFAIL 
The healthiest people haven’t worn a mask or injected the poison.  Damn Criminals #unmaskthekids

@KashPrime Great plan, really, but it doesn’t allow for widespread govt control, divisive demonizing of conservatives, and excessively wide tolerances for oppressive emergency actions - so it will never fly.
@KashPrime @fitterhappierAJ You’ve taken a complex subject and broken it down so that even I, as a non-science person, now have some understanding of T-cells and the immune system. Thank you so much!

@KashPrime So your suggestion is to live in a state of seasonal covid restrictions with a varying degree of severity until we get “better vaccines” and revaccinate tens/hundreds and even billions of millions of people across the globe?  Truly you can’t be that blind to not read the room.
